title: Ticket #5596: condor_status should summarize machine from the partitionable slot
description:
when condor_status is showing startd/machine information. it should pull only partitionable & static slots and display 1 line of information per machine.

This will be explicitly be enabled using a new option -compact, but it should eventually be the new default behavior of condor_status.

The -compact option should work with all of the various queries for machine/slot ads.
remarks:
2016-May-17 09:33:00 by tannenba:
The -compact option does not appear in the condor_status usage message.

Also, it is documented in the man page incorrectly - hint: it doesn't take any arguments, and isn't is a 'Display option' attribute instead of a 'Custom option' ?

FWIW, i think the labeling of every option as Display, or Custom (whats the difference really??), etc, is kinda silly. Currently nothing is tagged as a Display option. Why bother?

2016-May-17 09:56:21 by tim:
The -compact option appears right after the -constraint option in the usage message.
